Uses of Class
petrinet.Arc

  • Uses of Arc in petrinet

    Subclasses of Arc in petrinet
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DrainerArc
    The 'DrainerArc' class represents a specialized type of Arc that drains tokens from a Place when activated.
    class 
    ZeroArc
    The 'ZeroArc' class represents a specialized type of Arc that does not contribute to token flow.
    Methods in petrinet that return types with arguments of type Arc
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Arc>
    PetriNetwork.getArcs()
    Retrieves the list of arcs in the Petri network.
    List<Arc>
    Place.getArcs()
    Retrieves the list of arcs associated with this place.
    List<Arc>
    Transition.getArcs()
    Retrieves the list of arcs associated with this transition.
